page.title: 13SPECIAL DAYS,KIRKCOWAN
page.content: One Wednesday each month,Mr Majcher, the{minister}comes to conduct a{ {service}in the school hall.We sing hymns and a senior pupil reads from the Bible.The minister usually tells us a story and sometimes presents{ {certificates}to prize winning pupils. Every{Christmas}we dress up and bring food to school for a party.The hall has been decorated and the tree put up.Mr Wilson plays the piano for{ {dances}like Drops of Brandy and Farmers in the Den.We play{games}such as Pass the Parcel and we have a dancing competition. Each year the seniors are taught how to use a compass,read and set a map in {orienteering lessons.}At the end of the lessons we go to{Kirroughtree {Forest}to orienteer in groups of two to four people.Sometimes we{compete} against other schools in orienteering.
